title: Celebrity Puzzling
overview: Get ready for Celebrity Puzzling, where your favourite celebrities battle tricky puzzles in a showdown of logic, speed and sheer determination.Hosted by the ever-charismatic Jeremy Vine, every night sees quiz queen Carol Vorderman and beloved actor Sally Lindsay lead two celebrity teams into a battle of mind-bending puzzles and challenges.But who will crack the code and claim victory, and who will be left scratching their heads at the back of the class?
